TextBlock.Text: POKE: If my time-keeping is correct, Quercus is expecting another resupply run. Is anyone on <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow</color> available for a quick shuttle trip?
MITIS: I am willing to assist. However, I am unaware of the procedure for reaching Quercus' craft.

YARROW: I hope he makes good use of those components he "borrowed." If we are not able to complete the <color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color>, at least the technologies we developed will see some use.

POKE: You are familiar with the workings of the Ash Twin warp towers, correct? The warp to Quercus' craft follows the same principle, only the alignment is between Brittle Hollow and White Hole Station. As long as you launch your shuttle within that window, you will arrive there safely.

CLARY: To be technically correct (the best kind of correct), the alignment is with Quercus' craft itself, not with <color=lightblue>White Hole Station</color>. With how far he has traveled, the window should be fairly forgiving (about a minute or so).
